content: super quick and relatively easy pattern perfect for all you meat lovers out there it is made in one piece joining as you go meaning there is minimal sewing required perfect pattern for the holiday season or for taking to a barbecue 3 page written pattern advanced beginner/intermediate level © teri hamilton crochet@teri s 2023 this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission it is permitted to make items from this pattern provided they meet safety guidelines and crochet at teri s is accredited
